com.xebialabs.restito.builder.verify

Class VerifyHttp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.restito.builder.verify.VerifyHttp

  • public class VerifyHttp
extends java.lang.Object

    Responsible for building verifications (e.g. something happened x times).

    • Method Summary
